title: I am in first year and doing b.Tech agriculture engineering. What are the scholarship that I can apply for? - Quora
tags: College and University Scholarship and Fellowships Advice

response.answer_text: There are very less chances of scholarship after admission. You could have taken admission through ICAR-AIEEE-UG exam, then you might have get the Rs.3000/month fellowship. At present you can apply for one of the following scholarship: Merit scholarship : If you are the topper in your class (on the basis of 12th standard marks)Minority scholarship: If you belongs to any minority caste or religion then you can apply at Social welfare department of your native district.Employee encouragement scholarship : If your father is employee is any bank or corporate sector then enquire at his work place. Many organisations offer scholarship to children of their employees.NGO/Foundations : There are many NGOs, who offer financial assistance to children from BPL families.
